## Parser class

csv parser

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Parser<T = Record<string, string>> 
```

## Example


```ts
import Parser from '@gregoranders/csv';

const parser = new Parser();
const rows = parser.parse('a,b,c\n1,2,3\n4,5,6');
```
